title: Spicy Pasta, Bean, and Sausage Soup
directions: Strain liquid from canned beans into blender. Add 1 cup beans and puree until smooth. Heat oil in large pot over medium heat. Add sausages, rosemary, garlic, and crushed red pepper. Saut√© until sausages are cooked through, breaking up with fork, about 8 minutes. Mix in tomato paste. Add bean puree, remaining beans, broth, and pasta. Simmer until pasta is tender and mixture is thick, stirring occasionally, about 30 minutes. Mix in 1/4 cup cheese. Season with salt and pepper. Serve, passing remaining 1 1/4 cups cheese.
ingredients: 1 pound Italian hot sausages, casings removed
8 ounces (about 2 1/3 cups) orecchiette (little ear-shaped pasta) or other small pasta
